solution_line_template: {pickup_minutes} minutes for picking up toys, {vacuum_minutes} minutes to vacuum, {windows_minutes} minutes on windows and {furniture_minutes} minutes on furniture is {pickup_minutes}+{vacuum_minutes}+{windows_minutes}+{furniture_minutes} = <<{pickup_minutes}+{vacuum_minutes}+{windows_minutes}+{furniture_minutes}={total_per_week}>>{total_per_week} minutes
After {num_weeks} weeks, she has spent {num_weeks} weeks * {total_per_week} minutes/week = <<{num_weeks}*{total_per_week}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes cleaning the living room
